course_description: A survey of the Great Proletarian Cultural Revolution (1966 - 1976). Students will study revolutionary songs, films, and model plays, in addition to the visual and material culture of the period. Students will also stage a performance of Taking Tiger Mountain by Strategy.
schedule_location:
TTh 10am-11:15am in Modern Language 201
T 4:30pm-6:30pm in Modern Language 201
